humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions metastatic adenocarcinoma in 3 out of 3 lymph nodes in sentinel lymph node #1, metastatic adenocarcinoma in 1 out of 1 lymph node in sentinel lymph node #2, metastatic adenocarcinoma in 1 out of 4 lymph nodes in the left axillary mass, and metastatic adenocarcinoma in 1 out of 20 lymph nodes in the left axillary contents. This information corresponds to N2 according to the AJCC staging system (New Rule 14) as there are metastases in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic adenocarcinoma in 3 out of 3 sentinel lymph nodes from the left axilla (specimen B) and metastatic adenocarcinoma in 1 out of 20 lymph nodes from the left axillary contents (specimen F). This corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N2 (AJCC Edition) as per the report.
